text: Miklos Perlus (born March 23, 1977) is a Canadian actor, writer, and story editor. Perlus has appeared on Canadian series Student Bodies, Road to Avonlea and Sidekick. He has written for Degrassi: The Next Generation and other series. He has also worked in television program development for several organizations. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Writers from Toronto
title: Miklos Perlus
